author: Ato Metto
text: Just know that Elon can’t end world hunger so long as poor ppl around the world are being exploited…so instead of being keyboard warriors against an entrepreneur who’s overcome Asperger syndrome to become the worlds wealthiest man, challenge the UN/IMF/World Bank to do better.

author: Ato Metto
text: All in all, per usual, nobody knows wtf they are talking about and the “powers at be” prefer it that way... Stay distracted & keep arguing about shit that doesn’t matter on this app so long as it doesn’t get in the way of 🇺🇸 hegemony & NATO (elite yt ppl) controlled global order!

author: Ato Metto
text: People are allowed to spew all sorts of bullshit on this app day and night, but once their voice becomes loud enough and their content goes against 🇺🇸 FP narratives (examples: war in Ukraine, China & Ethiopia’s internal conflicts, Wikileaks, etc.) 💥 account suspended!

author: Ato Metto
text: This isn’t about hate speech - WAKE UP PEOPLE - protecting people from hate speech is just a cover for silencing dissent, especially from the main stream media narrative on anything that deals with 🇺🇸 national intelligence and/or foreign policy.

author: Ato Metto
text: Per Twitter’s CURRENT policies, many accounts are being suspended and/or completely removed from Twitter all together simply due to the fact that they release information that goes against the narrative that Twitter and it’s handlers deem to be correct narrative (aka Fake News).

author: Ato Metto
text: Lastly, but most importantly, there’s the idea that Elon will be looking to single handedly “control the narrative” of all meaningful conversations on Twitter… I hate to break it to y’all, but that’s ALREADY HAPPENING!

author: Ato Metto
text: If WFP wanted to truly end world hunger they would be funding education and agricultural development…instead they distribute “food aid”. This is a crutch. As the saying goes “give a man a fish and he can eat for a day, but TEACH a man how to fish and he’ll eat for a LIFETIME”

author: Ato Metto
text:
What WFP gave him was nothing more than a grant proposal masked as a plan, that wouldn’t end world hunger at all! It would AT BEST cover 1-2 years of global “food aid”… there is no easy way to say this y’all - WFP DOESN’T WANT TO SOLVE WORLD HUNGER!!!
Why do I say that?
Simple…

author: Ato Metto
text: Another talking point is “WFP gave him a $6B plan to end world hunger and he didn’t follow through” 🤦🏾‍♂️ … 🧢 https://t.co/EYXzqJmEQq

author: Ato Metto
text: The irony here is as much as people are on Elon’s case about what he decides to do with his own money, it’s actually the banks money that will purchase Twitter and therefor all this talk should be focused at the banks being able to fund better projects… & with that being said….

author: Ato Metto
text: Yes, you read that right, a $27B loan! And why would a bank loan out that much money? It’s easy money! The interest payments alone will be hundreds of millions of dollars, and will be borrowed against his assets which is Tesla itself! A win-win for Goldman Sachs (or w.e. bank)…

author: Ato Metto
text: In order for Elon to buy Twitter, he is going to go into MASSIVE debt… it’s rumored that he’ll be putting down somewhere around $17B that he will raise from the sale of Tesla stock… even w/ this cash, he will then need to borrow, get this, $27 BILLION from a bank (likely GS)…

author: Ato Metto
text: First and foremost, anyone who thinks Elon Musk has $44B dollars worth of Cash laying around to buy Twitter has absolutely no understanding of how finance works… (and thats okay) so let me explain how this will likely actually work out…

author: Ato Metto
text:
I took about two months off social media for tsom (Ethiopian Orthodox “lent” fasting regimen) just to come back and to see that nothing has changed and nobody knows wtf they are talking about… Exhibit A) Elon Musk buying Twitter!

A thread…
